getPortNumber().Description: Returns the port number of the port

getName().Description: Returns the name of the port, or empty string if the port has no name

getType().Description: Returns the port type of the port (either @B_android#media#midi#MidiDeviceInfo#PortInfo#TYPE_INPUT_E@ or @B_android#media#midi#MidiDeviceInfo#PortInfo#TYPE_OUTPUT_E@)

ClassDesc: Contains information about an input or output port.
